name: Hidden Winter Cats
description:
❄️ Find 100 hidden kitties in this snowy location - free!

🌈 Paint them in your favorite colors just by clicking on them. It only takes 5 minutes of your free time.


Key features:


❄️ 1 big level absolutely free
🐾 100 various hidden cats
🎧 15+ real meow sounds
🎨 Choice of colors for painting
🔮 Hint system
🎯 Camera zoom in and out
🎮 Gamepad support
🧩 100 achievements
👨‍👩‍👦 Suitable for all ages
🏆 Also 1 bonus level:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2845670/Hidden_Winter_Cats__Bonus_Level/

🔍 Can you find all the hidden cats?
